pyAssetMngr.desc: A gui interface to manage tool, show and shot assets. Provides update and other asset information.

pyAssetMngr.desc: A gui interface to manage tool, show and shot assets. Provides update and other asset information.
notes: Added asset update report that let's artists know what assets were added, modified, or removed.
Help icon now points to core\images
Added not approved label for assets pulled from work folder
Added strikethrough for assets whose files are not on the server
Fixed download bug causing failures for assets whose files don't exist on the server.

notes: Auto-close window after update or install option pressed.
